title: The Directorate of Information Technology will develop a web portal on which the developer of every Smart Fin Tech Centre will be bound to provide / update detailed information about names of the units in the park, utilization of built-up area and activities being carried out, manpower employed in the Smart Fin Tech Centre on yearly basis
clause_text: The Directorate of Information Technology will develop a web portal on which the developer of every Smart Fin Tech Centre will be bound to provide / update detailed information about names of the units in the park, utilization of built-up area and activities being carried out, manpower employed in the Smart Fin Tech Centre on yearly basis.
section: 33(13)(A) Buildings of Smart Fin Tech Centre

source_pdf.text_snippet: The Directorate of Information Technology will develop a web portal on which the developer of every Smart Fin Tech Centre will be bound to provide / update detailed information about names of the unit
